verses.verse: The word <WH1697> of the YY <WH3068> came again unto me, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,
Son <WH1121> of man <WH120>, set <WH7760> <WH8798> thy face <WH6440> against the Ammonites <WH1121> <WH5983>, and prophesy <WH5012> <WH8734> against them;

And say <WH559> <WH8804> unto the Ammonites <WH1121> <WH5983>, Hear <WH8085> <WH8798> the word <WH1697> of the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>; Thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>; Because thou saidst <WH559> <WH8800>, Aha <WH1889>, against my sanctuary <WH4720>, when it was profaned <WH2490> <WH8738>; and against the land <WH127> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, when it was desolate <WH8074> <WH8738>; and against the house <WH1004> of Y'hudah <WH3063>, when they went <WH1980> <WH8804> into captivity <WH1473>;

Behold, therefore I will deliver <WH5414> <WH8802> thee to the men <WH1121> of the east <WH6924> for a possession <WH4181>, and they shall set <WH3427> <WH8765> their palaces <WH2918> in thee, and make <WH5414> <WH8804> their dwellings <WH4908> in thee: they shall eat <WH398> <WH8799> thy fruit <WH6529>, and they shall drink <WH8354> <WH8799> thy milk <WH2461>.

And I will make <WH5414> <WH8804> Rabbah <WH7237> a stable <WH5116> for camels <WH1581>, and the Ammonites <WH1121> <WH5983> a couchingplace <WH4769> for flocks <WH6629>: and ye shall know <WH3045> <WH8804> that I am the YY <WH3068>.

For thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>; Because thou hast clapped <WH4222> <WH8763> thine hands <WH3027>, and stamped <WH7554> <WH8800> with the feet <WH7272>, and rejoiced <WH8055> <WH8799> in heart <WH5315> with all thy despite <WH7589> against the land <WH127> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>;

Behold, therefore I will stretch out <WH5186> <WH8804> mine hand <WH3027> upon thee, and will deliver <WH5414> <WH8804> thee for a spoil <WH957> <WH8675> <WH897> to the heathen <WH1471>; and I will cut thee off <WH3772> <WH8689> from the people <WH5971>, and I will cause thee to perish <WH6> <WH8689> out of the countries <WH776>: I will destroy <WH8045> <WH8686> thee; and thou shalt know <WH3045> <WH8804> that I am the YY <WH3068>.

Thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>; Because <WH3282> that Moab <WH4124> and Seir <WH8165> do say <WH559> <WH8800>, Behold, the house <WH1004> of Y'hudah <WH3063> is like unto all the heathen <WH1471>;

Therefore, behold, I will open <WH6605> <WH8802> the side <WH3802> of Moab <WH4124> from the cities <WH5892>, from his cities <WH5892> which are on his frontiers <WH7097>, the glory <WH6643> of the country <WH776>, Bethjeshimoth <WH1020>, Baalmeon <WH1186>, and Kiriathaim <WH7156>,

Unto the men <WH1121> of the east <WH6924> with the Ammonites <WH1121> <WH5983>, and will give <WH5414> <WH8804> them in possession <WH4181>, that the Ammonites <WH1121> <WH5983> may not be remembered <WH2142> <WH8735> among the nations <WH1471>.
And I will execute <WH6213> <WH8799> judgments <WH8201> upon Moab <WH4124>; and they shall know <WH3045> <WH8804> that I am the YY <WH3068>.

Thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>; Because that Edom <WH123> hath dealt <WH6213> <WH8800> against the house <WH1004> of Y'hudah <WH3063> by taking <WH5358> <WH8800> vengeance <WH5359>, and hath greatly <WH816> <WH8800> offended <WH816> <WH8799>, and revenged <WH5358> <WH8738> himself upon them;

Therefore thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>; I will also stretch out <WH5186> <WH8804> mine hand <WH3027> upon Edom <WH123>, and will cut off <WH3772> <WH8689> man <WH120> and beast <WH929> from it; and I will make <WH5414> <WH8804> it desolate <WH2723> from Teman <WH8487>; and they of Dedan <WH1719> shall fall <WH5307> <WH8799> by the sword <WH2719>.

And I will lay <WH5414> <WH8804> my vengeance <WH5360> upon Edom <WH123> by the hand <WH3027> of my people <WH5971> Yisra'EL <WH3478>: and they shall do <WH6213> <WH8804> in Edom <WH123> according to mine anger <WH639> and according to my fury <WH2534>; and they shall know <WH3045> <WH8804> my vengeance <WH5360>, saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>.

Thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>; Because the Philistines <WH6430> have dealt <WH6213> <WH8800> by revenge <WH5360>, and have taken <WH5358> <WH8735> vengeance <WH5359> with a despiteful <WH7589> heart <WH5315>, to destroy <WH4889> it for the old <WH5769> hatred <WH342>;

Therefore thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>; Behold, I will stretch out <WH5186> <WH8802> mine hand <WH3027> upon the Philistines <WH6430>, and I will cut off <WH3772> <WH8689> the Cherethims <WH3774>, and destroy <WH6> <WH8689> the remnant <WH7611> of the sea <WH3220> coast <WH2348>.

And I will execute <WH6213> <WH8804> great <WH1419> vengeance <WH5360> upon them with furious <WH2534> rebukes <WH8433>; and they shall know <WH3045> <WH8804> that I am the YY <WH3068>, when I shall lay <WH5414> <WH8800> my vengeance <WH5360> upon them.
